post.body: w/ the extra ram, better hd, graphics etc - it added up
don't fuck with me twinkle toes
your eloquence is both refreshing and, ironically, stale.
who? Me??
that was one of the worst pieces of writing to ever be printed in the new yorker. Was the writer drunk?
SEO is the real estate scam of the 00s. "you too can make $6k in just one month" take my seminar!
holy shit!! U raised $11k?!? Amazing!
the china thing. Was it an article or just an outline of an article?
at least it ain't Lenders which shouldn't even be allowed to call their bread product bagels
having a whole in the center no more makes your product a bagel than being circumsized makes u Jewish
Fringe was okay this evening. Nothing to smoke a bowl over.
I have an early morning awaiting me, so I just might sign off
RT @Armano: OK, here's the favor. It's a big one. For big hearts. Please help. http://is.gd/eKbo Please retweet.
alright, time for bed. Wake up early and finish my overview writeup of the social media interaction design workshop w/studio
night T'verse. Perhaps tomorrow I will be a better humble servant and less of a dick.
weird, though, every time another rockstar in the social media world follows me, I feel like I need to tone it down a bit, perhaps tomorrow
late start this morning, heading to the shower and then off to the client
You know- I read "digital literacy" and the whole cult of the 0 inbox is bullshit!!
I love fukin first class on Acela. Where is my massage god dammit!
